caption.p: Trends in a) the relative difference of potential productivity (ΔProd) between the reduced and the full model for each driver of change and in b) ω 2 for each driver of change in Black-backed Woodpecker potential productivity under the RCP 2.6, RCP 4.5 and RCP 8.5 forcing scenarios. In b), ω 2 values were obtained through three-way factorial ANOVA performed at each time step.
